message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is a more realistic price considering its value. This offer reflects the product's worth.

Alice, I understand that you want to get a good price for the product, but $8,000 is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $8,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
